trans-unit.source: How manage user accounts in Azure API Management
trans-unit.target: How manage user accounts in Azure API Management

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create or invite users in Azure API Management
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create or invite users in Azure API Management

trans-unit.source: How to manage user accounts in Azure API Management
trans-unit.target: How to manage user accounts in Azure API Management

trans-unit.source: In API Management, developers are the users of the APIs that you expose using API Management.
trans-unit.target: In API Management, developers are the users of the APIs that you expose using API Management.

trans-unit.source: This guide shows to how to create and invite developers to use the APIs and products that you make available to them with your API Management instance.
trans-unit.target: This guide shows to how to create and invite developers to use the APIs and products that you make available to them with your API Management instance.

trans-unit.source: Create a new developer
trans-unit.target: Create a new developer

trans-unit.source: To create a new developer, click **Manage** in the Azure Classic Portal for your API Management service.
trans-unit.target: To create a new developer, click **Manage** in the Azure Classic Portal for your API Management service.

trans-unit.source: This takes you to the API Management publisher portal.
trans-unit.target: This takes you to the API Management publisher portal.

trans-unit.source: If you have not yet created an API Management service instance, see [Create an API Management service instance][] in the [Get started with Azure API Management][] tutorial.
trans-unit.target: If you have not yet created an API Management service instance, see [Create an API Management service instance][] in the [Get started with Azure API Management][] tutorial.

trans-unit.source: ![Publisher portal][api-management-management-console]
trans-unit.target: ![Publisher portal][api-management-management-console]

trans-unit.source: Click **Users** from the **API Management** menu on the left, and then click **add user**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Users** from the **API Management** menu on the left, and then click **add user**.

trans-unit.source: ![Create developer][api-management-create-developer]
trans-unit.target: ![Create developer][api-management-create-developer]

trans-unit.source: Enter the **Email**, **Password**, and **Name** for the new developer and click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Enter the **Email**, **Password**, and **Name** for the new developer and click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: ![Create developer][api-management-add-new-user]
trans-unit.target: ![Create developer][api-management-add-new-user]

trans-unit.source: By default, newly created developer accounts are **Active**, and associated with the **Developers** group.
trans-unit.target: By default, newly created developer accounts are **Active**, and associated with the **Developers** group.

trans-unit.source: ![New developer][api-management-new-developer]
trans-unit.target: ![New developer][api-management-new-developer]

trans-unit.source: Developer accounts that are in an **active** state can be used to access all of the APIs for which they have subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: Developer accounts that are in an **active** state can be used to access all of the APIs for which they have subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: To associate the newly created developer with additional groups, see [How to associate groups with developers][].
trans-unit.target: To associate the newly created developer with additional groups, see [How to associate groups with developers][].

trans-unit.source: Invite a developer
trans-unit.target: Invite a developer

trans-unit.source: To invite a developer, click **Users** from the **API Management** menu on the left, and then click **Invite User**.
trans-unit.target: To invite a developer, click **Users** from the **API Management** menu on the left, and then click **Invite User**.

trans-unit.source: ![Invite developer][api-management-invite-developer]
trans-unit.target: ![Invite developer][api-management-invite-developer]

trans-unit.source: Enter the name and email address of the developer, and click **Invite**.
trans-unit.target: Enter the name and email address of the developer, and click **Invite**.

trans-unit.source: ![Invite developer][api-management-invite-developer-window]
trans-unit.target: ![Invite developer][api-management-invite-developer-window]

trans-unit.source: A confirmation message is displayed, but the newly invited developer does not appear in the list until after they accept the invitation.
trans-unit.target: A confirmation message is displayed, but the newly invited developer does not appear in the list until after they accept the invitation.

trans-unit.source: ![Invite confirmation][api-management-invite-developer-confirmation]
trans-unit.target: ![Invite confirmation][api-management-invite-developer-confirmation]

trans-unit.source: When a developer is invited, an email is sent to the developer.
trans-unit.target: When a developer is invited, an email is sent to the developer.

trans-unit.source: This email is generated using a template and is customizable.
trans-unit.target: This email is generated using a template and is customizable.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configure email templates][].
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Configure email templates][].

trans-unit.source: Once the invitation is accepted, the account becomes active.
trans-unit.target: Once the invitation is accepted, the account becomes active.

trans-unit.source: Deactivate or reactivate a developer account
trans-unit.target: Deactivate or reactivate a developer account

trans-unit.source: By default, newly created or invited developer accounts are **Active**.
trans-unit.target: By default, newly created or invited developer accounts are **Active**.

trans-unit.source: To deactivate a developer account, click **Block**.
trans-unit.target: To deactivate a developer account, click **Block**.

trans-unit.source: To reactivate a blocked developer account, click **Activate**.
trans-unit.target: To reactivate a blocked developer account, click **Activate**.

trans-unit.source: A blocked developer account can not access the developer portal or call any APIs.
trans-unit.target: A blocked developer account can not access the developer portal or call any APIs.

trans-unit.source: ![Block developer][api-management-new-developer]
trans-unit.target: ![Block developer][api-management-new-developer]

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Once a developer account is created, you can associate it with roles and subscribe it to products and APIs.
trans-unit.target: Once a developer account is created, you can associate it with roles and subscribe it to products and APIs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to create and use groups][].
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [How to create and use groups][].
